title: uLLam urugi urugi bhajanai
sahitya:
uLLam urugi urugi bhajanai shiguvOm hari Om tat sat Om hariyena


anupallavi

  tuLLit-tiriyum kaLLa manadin tuDippum vanja aDippuminriyE


caraNam    vADum payirgaL shezhikka vAn mazhaiyamudam pozhivAn
pADum anbar kaLikka aruT-paNgaL koNDu taruvAn
Udum pAvum pOla uyiril kUDi vAzhum azhagnuDanE
uNmaiyAgak-kulavi amarattanmai vandu nammai aDaiya
